website_summaries.verdict: Good all-around camera offered at a low price point that includes a 30X optical zoom.
pros: Great travel camera because of its small size and large optical zoom lens
Includes an adequate 18.2 megapixels of resolution
Has 3-inch LCD screen with the ability to tilt it at multiple angles
Good performance for close-up photos with an accurate AF system
cons: Wi-Fi connection is difficult to set up

customer_reviews.title: I love the active viewfinder
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use Canon Digital SLR cameras, but I needed a small camera for a trip abroad. I particularly like the active viewfinder. It works great in very bright sunlight. So far the camera has met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: hillcountry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera, great price
customer_reviews.text: With a new baby on the way we decided that cell phone cameras weren't going to cut it. After doing some research I settled on the Sony DSCHX80. This camera is awesome! You can either keep it really simple or dive into more advanced settings (lots of YouTube videos). The WiFi feature wasn't originally a selling point but after using it I love it. If your phone has NFC it makes transferring pictures super easy. You can also use your phone as a remote with a live preview. I liked this camera so much I convinced my boss to buy one and we now use it for product pictures. I highly recommend it for personal or small business use.
customer_reviews.author: tylerite

customer_reviews.title: A MUST
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this camera! I have a larger SONY (A6000) but enjoy the point and shoot of this one. Albeit a very nice point & shoot this camera is LOADED with capabilities and features. I love the pop up viewer, especially when the glare is high on the screen. GREAT purchase!
customer_reviews.author: gail e. safford

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: we love this camera just used it on our cruise and took beautiful pictures and all on one battery we had a spare but it stayed in our room once you set how you want it we used auto then just point and shoot the zoom is great but it does take a steady hand when maxed out but for normal pics its great..
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: A stunning achievement in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This camera will not disappoint. I purchased this as a gift to replace a clunky DSLR. The camera is incredible. The optical zoom is amazing and you still get an incredible digital zoom in addition. It is only slightly larger than an iPhone yet has all the features of a much larger camera. The flash is tiny in size yet extremely capable. The pop up eye piece takes a little getting accustomed to but is very functional and activates when you look through it like magic. If you think your phone is good enough for your pictures, try this camera, it will change your mind.
customer_reviews.author: Fillmore2

customer_reviews.title: Good pictures, bad design
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Panasonic to Sony after reading good reviews for this particular model. The good: It takes good pictures. The bad: the back side is crowded with too many buttons, with no space to rest the right hand thumb when holding the camera (and I have a small thumb!). I often find myself pushing one, thus opening/changing a feature before taking the picture I am aiming to. There is also a lot of motor noise when taking videos. I contacted Sony customer service, they never replied. Now I remember why I shouldn't buy Sony.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: just best for trips
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about 1.5 year. Move over with it many travels including hiking in desert , forests , night campings, several times fell down it , I cant belive its surviving all that and still prefectly functional .. :) So compact , light weight and so powerfull , just best for trips , long hiking or where ever you cant houl big heavy cameras with set of lenses. Like its: Ability to take 2 pictures automatically regular and HDR so one of 2 always good when bad condition Optical zoom 30 is very useful, Id be like more .. Not bad at low light conditions Many other features. Durability, Strength.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard

customer_reviews.title: Buy something else!
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality suck ass in the dark, it's horrible to take to any events. I never been so disappointed in a camera. Bought this JUST for a concert and the person in the red selfie was the guitarist with the band and you can't even tell... I was vip and zoomed up to get an closer picture of ronnie and it was pixelated so bad. This camera is only good for day time events. I put a picture in here of me and my husband waiting in line. To show how different this was. During the day it had beautiful results. As for night or dark even lighted up concerts...... Noooooppppppepeeee.
customer_reviews.author: ShutterPanda

customer_reviews.title: decent camera. overpriced though for it's features
customer_reviews.text: hard to hold onto but the camera does take great photos. love the selfie feature, although I don't do the selfie's LOL! gotta love Kids! The wifi feature and the ability to transfer to any bluetooth device is amazing! that's a definite plus. Only reason why I kept it. good for everyday shots. Zoom isn't as good as they boast. doesn't go that far on zoom, though better than most. Over all a decent camera, but too expensive for it's features for the everyday person. Sadly, I went back to my DSLR camera and use this off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Lorrykirk

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the pictures is quite good although I do miss not having the capability of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera as a travel device when I don't want to bring a larger DSLR. The quality of the pictures is quite good although I do miss not having the capability of saving in the RAW format. My number one requirement for this compact point-and-shoot was to have a viewfinder (which this camera has). The camera is a tad bit thicker than I thought it would be but it still stores easily in my cargo shorts pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Gildersleeve

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Nice Features
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, but I needed to reset the date and time, and there were no instructions for such a basic feature. Still can't figure it out. The camera has a lot more features than my old one, so lots to learn. I was most interested in a quick shutter speed because I like to photograph animals, and it is instant, perfect for what I was looking for. I can see I will enjoy learning all the features of this little camera and have much better photos.
customer_reviews.author: Chihuahua Mom

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Middle Ground...
customer_reviews.text: We like it because it fits that middle ground between a mobile phone camera (which is terrible in certain conditions) and a large Digital SLR, which can be too bulky and cumbersome to lug around, and it takes very good pictures with many features for such a small handheld camera.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, value and shipping, seller
customer_reviews.text: I have an SLR platform with 3 lenses and basically a backpack full of gear. I became frustrated that after seeing photos my teenaged daughter took with this small Sony camera, as on 5x7 or 8x10 sized prints, the photo quality of stills is basically the same as my SLR platform. We took off France with (3) Sony dschX80 cameras. It was GREAT not to have my “backpack” full of camera gear!! Photos were OUTSTANDING!! Camera size is great, fit in my front pocket or aftermarket small belt pack. Camera is simple to use and sync with phone is fantastic! Great pictures and videos, quick start up. Highly recommend. It does pretty well with action photos.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Small 30x Zoom Camera
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like this camera. I was looking for something small with a long zoom to use as a back-up for my Sony a-6000. The Sony HX-80 seems to perform very well in bright light and merely OK in dim light. I expected this based on the features of the camera. Controls are a bit small for my fingers, but I also expected this to be the case with such a small camera.
customer_reviews.author: HML

customer_reviews.title: This has performed really well for years.  I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: I like this camera a lot. It is is a bit pricey, but I feel like the features justify it. Images are very good, video is pretty good. It is lightweight, the zoom range is huge, wide angle (widest zoom) is good. I've had this for years and it has performed well. I really like that I don't need to take out a battery and use a separate charger!! Just plug in a USB micro, same as a cell phone, and it charges. Charging is fast. I have one minor gripe about the menu and interface, but that is minor. I would buy this again, and it would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Honest John

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera!!! The viewfinder really sets this tiny point-and-shoot apart from much of the rest of the pack. I've taken thousands of photos (mostly of small birds) with it in the US and abroad while hiking/birding--it's completely changed my experience of birding for the better. Sure, it's not as fast/clear/bright as a much larger DSLR, but I can't stick that type of camera in a pocket while hiking through rough terrain and carrying a binocular and backpack (and possibly hiking poles).
customer_reviews.author: chrissy bear

customer_reviews.title: Versatile big little camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is wonderful for trips (it has gone to Mexico, TX, Alaska and Virginia so far) as well as locally. From the macro to the zoom, it does a terrific job. (See bear cub photo above from my recent Alaska trip.) great people pictures too. It is so lightweight I can just tuck in the camera case I bought for it that goes on my belt. I did add a camera strap. Despite its small size, it feels good in my hands and the buttons are easy to operate. I carried an extra battery and charged my batteries every night but only needed to replace the battery once during one particularly intense day of photographing.
customer_reviews.author: MJH

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera with controls placed so that one can't make mistakes easily. However, the manual is nearly useless. It is so brief that while basic controls are mentioned, important details are missing. What is "intelligent +" -- not a clue. I know that the product cycle on cameras is short, but I'd still like to know what I spent $300 on.
customer_reviews.author: WC7P

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: About the only thing I photograph is pollinators, so I'm usually out in the bright sun of the prairie when I'm taking pictures. The viewfinder on this camera has made all the difference in my being able to see what I'm photographing. I've only just begun learning all of the camera's functions, and already I'm getting some unbelievable shots. The size of the camera is perfect for me to get in between stems, leaves, and flowers without chasing off my little bug subjects. After doing quite a bit of research, I had high expectations for this camera, and they've been met--or even exceeded. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: Pseudo-Intellectual

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Camera with Lots of Features
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a replacement for my pocket sized camera and this sure fit the bill. Even smaller than the camera I was replacing, it has even more features including Panorama which mine didn't have. Love the zoom! Especially good in low light situations. Really enjoy using it! I also have a mirrorless "DSLR" but I end up using this one more often. High quality photos. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SpaceMom125

customer_reviews.title: its the worst camera i bought i want a refund it sucks i would give it a 0 if they had it
customer_reviews.text: i bought this camera and it was awsome but after i turn it on and off a few times the start to jam and it said turn the camera off then on and it would not close. i am not happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE YOUR FLASH IS UP!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this camera is that you have to remember to physically pop up the flash. Many times I don't remember to do this because the previous Sony I had popped up automatically. In this new model that I have, you can specify "forced flash" but nothing will happen unless you make the flash box open up. That's inconvenient and I don't know WHY Sony has not continued the "automatic flash pop-up" option. Other than that, the zoom is fantastic and picture quality very fine! I use the "smooth skin" option and everyone looks great in my photos, making people very happy to pose for me.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not for sport photography
customer_reviews.text: A compact and efficient camera for family snaps--just so long as no one is moving. It is terrible at dealing with any movement and utterly incapable of capturing sports photos. The panorama feature works very well. If you want a general camera for family and scenery, this is a good choice at an excellent price point. If you want pictures of your kids playing soccer or a local track meet, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: I. Whatley

customer_reviews.title: Good product but....
customer_reviews.text: Great small camera. I replaced a Panasonic the had a broken case. This camera feels heavier and a little better build quality. Takes great pictures. Only complaint I have is with the display. It is VERY hard to see in bright sunlight. I use the pop up viewfinder most times because of the screen washout. Would certainly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: It was fast and took really good pics. Perfect travel camera
customer_reviews.text: Took 1200+ pics on our trip to Jamaica. It was fast and took really good pics. Perfect travel camera. Did not miss not lugging around DSLR and lenses for the week.
customer_reviews.author: Jeephead

customer_reviews.title: POP UP VEIW window
customer_reviews.text: I love the camera. Makes wonderful pictures. I took pictures on vacation from a moving car and they turned out beautifully. The zoom is great. However the pop up viewer died on our trip and the return time had passed before we got home.. We did take out An Asurion 2 year protection plan. Will see if they will repair the pop up viewer window. This small problem will not keep me from saying how good this camera really is. Small compact, gives pictures like a much more expensive camera.. I would still buy it again
customer_reviews.author: John E. Rompf

customer_reviews.title: amazing images, fun to play with and does the ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional photographer and was looking for something to travel with abroad. No bulk, amazing images, fun to play with and does the job perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Saldua

customer_reviews.title: IT'S A GOOOOD CAMERA!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the camera, especially the flip screen. It has great quality, but not at all in low lightning. It's very grainy when you try to flip at night or if the sun is setting. Over all the camera is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: maya

customer_reviews.title: Great travel camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little camera for a vacation where you may see wildlife. With a 30 times optical zoom and image stabilization, we were able to get some great pictures for our Costa Rica trip. I was going to take my full-size camera and lenses but decided to invest in this instead. Took it on every trip because it fit in my pocket versus having to consider how much camera gear to lug.
customer_reviews.author: Roger M

customer_reviews.title: Very compact, high quality camera with great ZZZZoom!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, ultra-compact, Leica lens, viewfinder for difficult shots, built-in flash, Optical zoom is impressive and digital extended zoom is amazingly good for its size. Great AI software with excellent color rendition.
customer_reviews.author: Ibidme

customer_reviews.title: GREAT little camera
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a trip using this camera for the first time. It is so easy to use and get to know!!! In my opinion the only flaw is that it almost helps you out too much. Sometimes less is more. But it will be my go to fun camera for sure.
customer_reviews.author: annette motz

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this to have something smaller then my nikon, something easier to travel with .. love it, would recommend and the viewing piece to look through pulls out and has a focus slider and works great for bright sunlight when the main screen is hard to see.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Town

customer_reviews.title: Superb Camera.  A Sony Classic.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pocket sized camera that does everything right. Big bang for the buck. Zoom is incredible. Only downside is the Sony smart phone apps and controlling it via the apps is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Mekong

customer_reviews.title: A Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: So far the camera is doing a great job. Just as good as the big Sony we had before. We bought it because it's going to be much easier to carry on our international vacations.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: A great camera that takes great pictures. This camera will do just about anything you want a camera to do. You will have to read the instruction booklet to use the more advanced functions properly.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Theuer

customer_reviews.title: Great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use - compact - great photos - after over 2000 photos, I am glad I have this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Larry O

customer_reviews.title: my shots in love light and at night were some of my best
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a wanderlust trip and it worked amazingly, my shots in love light and at night were some of my best. Now I will be enrolling in a photographry class to prep for my next trip!
customer_reviews.author: Damali

customer_reviews.title: Takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I'm still learning some of the features on the camera, but it takes good pictures and is easy to function.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy J. Pehl

customer_reviews.title: Quality, affordable, and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a trip out west this past summer. I was looking for something that had good zoom capability for wildlife photos but could also get good scenery shots. I was not disappointed in the least. I am not a pro and I don't have any editing software, and I was getting photos that were worth printing without any touch up work. This camera will be traveling with me from now on.
customer_reviews.author: N. Frustaglio

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera.. takes great pictures...is a little heavier than my old one, but still small and light enough to carry in my purse!
customer_reviews.author: DdV

customer_reviews.title: The viewfinder is the best part . It allows me to take pictures in bright sunlight.
customer_reviews.text: This camera fits in my pocket so I can always take it with me. The pop-up viewfinder is great for sunny outside picture taking, when the digital viewfinder screen is washed out. It has 40x optical zoom so distant and wildlife shots are easy to take. I have had it less than a year but so far no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk L Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this camera because of the viewfinder. I will now be able to see what I am taking a picture of in the bright sun lite.
customer_reviews.author: Delbert Voss

customer_reviews.title: Love the canera
customer_reviews.text: Took a walk with my new camera and got great shots. For a little camera, this is definitely worth the price. Took a while to figure out how to use the viewfinder and dial modes but, when all else fails read the directions!
customer_reviews.author: wendela

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera, but Questionable Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a bit now for vlogging footage but the quality just seems a bit questionable. Really wish I could have returned it but by the time I really started noticing the footage when editing, it had already passed the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bro I love this camera the price is amazing for this type ...
customer_reviews.text: Bro I love this camera the price is amazing for this type of camera it’s high quality and it helps me vlog so much easier with the flip up screen
customer_reviews.author: Tfivanavelar

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had returned it.
customer_reviews.text: I really have mixed feelings on this camera. It's small, light and takes decent photos but the focus leaves a lot to be desired. Has some really cool features but in all honesty I wish I had gone with something different. For the money I expected a little more.
customer_reviews.author: SavageKing

customer_reviews.title: Lousy indoors without flash
customer_reviews.text: My wife doesn't tolerate flash so I generally don't use it. This camera does not work well indoors without the flash.
customer_reviews.author: Doc74

customer_reviews.title: Great compact camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I realized I didn't have a camera that would take better pictures than my phone, so I did the research and bought this Sony. Takes wonderful pictures. Happy I bought it. Haven't found a better compact camera than this one, no matter the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: best Camara
customer_reviews.text: I just started a YouTube channel and I decided to give this camera a try. It's super easy to use and its a great camera to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Marcela Yzaguirre

customer_reviews.title: Small camera that takes great shots
customer_reviews.text: Terrific zoom with a fairly good lens. Great pictures especially in good lighting situations. The pop-up viewfinder is great!
customer_reviews.author: jimaz

customer_reviews.title: This is a quality point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.text: This a very good point and shoot camera. It isn't DSLR quality. In fact the picture quality isn't quite as good as earlier version. This would only be a problem if you were wanting to blow the picture up to poster size.
customer_reviews.author: George Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple point and shoot camera. Takes great pictures. Wish I would have paid $70-$80 more for the similar model, but has the added GPS feature.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little vacation capturing camera!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little camera! Amazing pictures! Easy and fun to use ! It’s a little bit hard to grip if you have large hands and if I was focused way out the stabilization wavered a bit . This was the perfect camera for me and what I needed to capture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built-in battery charger is not charging. It was returned ...
customer_reviews.text: Built-in battery charger is not charging. It was returned for replacement. Same problem with the charger on the second camera. Pictures are sharp overall.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera! Shady seller!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera and everything works fine, in fact I love almost everything this little guy can do for vlogging and youtube, BUT the seller sold it to me with a flash error. The camera flash doesn’t work. Wtf. Not cool man
customer_reviews.author: Rick N. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: A pocket sized camera with great zoom. Perfect for taking to concerts
customer_reviews.text: A pocket sized camera with great zoom. Perfect for taking to concerts. To bad it doesn't shoot in RAW.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Not for indoors or low-light
customer_reviews.text: Great for shots on a bright day, great zoom, EVF is a big plus. Images in low light come out blurry or fuzzy- iPhone 7 takes better indoor and low-light images. Not nearly as good as A6000. Better than competitor's point-and-shoot. Consider putting out more money on a better camera.
customer_reviews.author: sphen

customer_reviews.title: Gift that was just what my daughter wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my daughter, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Schpsych

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The screen on these cameras is great so you can take more selfies without some dumb selfie stick. The clarity and resolution is also really great. Takes great photos and is small so it packs easily.
customer_reviews.author: AmznJunkieX

customer_reviews.title: Camera failed after 14 months
customer_reviews.text: Error message 2 months out of warranty. Flash not working. Cannot get rid of message, so camera unusable. In shop over 6 weeks due to difficulty in getting parts. Last Sony I will ever buy!
customer_reviews.author: John R Marozsan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Easy to use. The flip up screen for selfies is helpful although it zooms in more then I'd like so your selfies are REAL close. But besides that no complaints. The zoom and panorama are great features.
customer_reviews.author: Super fun!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Serious Amatuer.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has so many manual controls its almost like a DSLR. The zoom is overkill and makes it heavy, but the pictures are super clear and the video is sharp too.
customer_reviews.author: K. J

customer_reviews.title: A great little travel camera
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. A great little travel camera. Takes good pictures and is trouble free.
customer_reviews.author: smokeyblu

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Beats the phone camera
customer_reviews.text: Having trouble with the auto focus but just need more practice. Very happy with this
customer_reviews.author: John Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This camera is wonderful! Lots of features and it seems easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera is wonderful! Lots of features and it seems easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Capn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely thrilled with this! It was everything I had hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Sue.Bidwell

customer_reviews.title: Issues with file formatting and import to mac
customer_reviews.text: So many issues trying to import files to Final Cut Pro. Could not use this for videos anymore
customer_reviews.author: MissADS1981

customer_reviews.title: We took this to the Galapagos and it took excellent pictures.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this far more than its expensive brother (RX 100 MIII) because of the zoom. We took this to the Galapagos and it took excellent pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Flight simmer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sweet
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as stated with awesome photo quality. Startup is pretty fast too so I haven't missed many opportunities either.
customer_reviews.author: Kapper

customer_reviews.title: Incredible photos. Great warranty service.
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough good about this camera. It's tiny and still has a 30x zoom. Put it on the enhanced auto mode and it will automatically take several pictures without flash in a dim museum and combine them into a high definition photo. Like all such cameras, the lens isn't sealed. During a trip to Petra in Jordan, a gust of sandy wind clogged up the lens mechanism while I was trying to retract it. Sony's warranty customer service personnel were great and it's camera repair partner sent the repaired camera back within a week of me sending it in. The camera was six weeks old and they repaired at no cost to me.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Jim

customer_reviews.title: Point and shoot camera! Simple
customer_reviews.text: I needed a camera for a trip to Ireland and this did the trick. Wanted something I could point and shoot so this was the best choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: an avid reader

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but seems that the new Android phones have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice but seems that the new Android phones have a lower light sensitivity and makes for a better picture
customer_reviews.author: John Lamia Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. I would like a touch screen but ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I would like a touch screen but for the price point you can't beat this camera!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great replacement camera. Love the viewfinder and flip screen for selfies.
customer_reviews.author: FeD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic little camera. Amazing camera for the price. Huge fan of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: joannboca

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I love this tiny powerful camera. The zoom range is quite impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera has great video quality and takes awesome pictures! The audio is iffy but I just bought a mic and now its the perfect camera for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Nowlin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: Never again. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS CAMERA. It’s a pain just to get videos out of camera onto computer. Worst purchase I ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Strong compact with some focus issues.
customer_reviews.text: Focus isn't great, can have a hard time finding you, especially for selfies, which is odd because a green box will pop up on screen to say it's recognized there's a face there, but then it focuses elsewhere often. Often! Love the zoom, does great color rendering. Handles night shots (where the flash fills you in, but gets the display/architecture/fountain) behind you in nice lighting very well. Fast to turn on, strong battery life.
customer_reviews.author: K. Mendelowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 yr old daughter she loves it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality indoor.... is ehhhh....
customer_reviews.text: Good for starters but quality is terrible in dark if you don’t have good lights in the room
customer_reviews.author: Jay W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Good for vlogging, great image resolution, and easy to transfer to your phone
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. fits in my pocket and has many ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. fits in my pocket and has many more features than I will ever use.
customer_reviews.author: Darwin Vance

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: I take it everywhere. Quick to turn on, focus and shoot. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera. Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera. Tiny, lightweight, incredible zoom, a usable eye piece, I have it with me most of the time. My computer is too old to be able to take advantage of the wifi connection which I didn't understand before I bought it
customer_reviews.author: RuthEE

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Cables included
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure how the wrong charger / connection cables were included.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Ghussin

customer_reviews.title: Issa camera
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level point and shoot camera. Amazing zoom for those small objects in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Point and Shoot.
customer_reviews.text: excellent small point and shoot. Easy to use, takes great pics. Nice and small to carry in your pocket or belt case on trips if you don't want to lug around a SLR. Would purchase again. Had another Sony for many years with no issues, expecting same from this.
customer_reviews.author: Punani

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect. I was able to zoom in on the ...
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect. I was able to zoom in on the eagles for some great pictures. Still more to learn but very pleased so far on the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: So far, I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for less than 24 hours and so far I am very impressed. User-friendly, a lot of features, excellent images. Looking forward to testing it further and optimistic that it will perform.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon A. Migliore

customer_reviews.title: Good pocket backup.
customer_reviews.text: Used it one weekend when I forgot the battery for my Nikon D7000. The view finder is reasonable. Not the image quality or ease of use of the D7000 but usable if you are not doing sports or moving wildlife. Color rendition is also better then most other point and shoot cameras I have used. The auto focus is reasonable, again, not a sports camera but otherwise good. I did not try using the "face finding" mode. I always use a fixed focus point so that I have control over it. At least this camera gives you the choice.
customer_reviews.author: mhubel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pictures and loved the flip up screen for selfies
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pictures and loved the flip up screen for selfies. The download to phone feature not requiring wifi was really cool...Was able to transfer to my phone in the middle of nowhere and later share with friends on social media from my phone when I had service.
customer_reviews.author: Sooner Girl

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are not as sharp as I would like them to be.
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are not as sharp as I would like them to be.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Kautz

customer_reviews.title: beautiful pictures and
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a camera for Christmas, after many comparisons and you tube videos he kept coming back to this model. For the $300 I sent it has not let us down. beautiful pictures and videos
customer_reviews.author: Tiffaney M Rice

customer_reviews.title: very nice camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I had originally purchased the Sony DSCHX90V/B but was not happy with it. One of the main reasons I purchased the 90V was the imbedded GPS. I learned that without the proper downloads no one else could see the GPS readings (as per Sony) so that was a waste. I alos had difficulty ( as in never) getting the WiFi to connect with my computer. I did a bit more research and decided to try the HB80 and I am very please with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to love this camera
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this camera... but it just wasn’t worth the money compared to the images on my iPhone 7+.
customer_reviews.author: Bknapp

customer_reviews.title: Great, high-quality travel camera
customer_reviews.text: I know everyone is taking pictures with their iPhone these days, but this is a great casual-use camera. The high-quality lens and images rivaled our much more expensive DSLR, and the Sony was easier to use during our trip to Madagascar. The zoom lens is remarkable and compact sizes makes it terrific for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Larry J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera and lots of features
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera and lots of features. Need small hands to manipulate the dials, etc.Batter and memory card slot not too sturdy and you need tweezers to remove memory card.
customer_reviews.author: Janet V.

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: On the product description it list that there is an app available for time-lapse mode. When I received the camera and attempted to download time-lapse feature from flimsy Play Memories store there are only 3 apps available! "My best portrait," "Smart remote," and "Phone Sync." Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: This camera far exceeds my expectations. My only annoyance is when it very bright outside and it's on auto, the camera won't always adjust the brightness leading to some very bright photos. Other than that it's wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Sony DSCHX80/B High Zoom Point & Shoot Camera (Black)
product_meta.description: Configuration:BaseGet sharp detail up close with the world’s smallest and lightest 30x zoom camera. There's even a pop-up electronic viewfinder for eye-level framing and a 180 Degree tilt screen for 18.2MP selfies. Stunning picture quality comes from the low light Exmor R sensor and premium ZIESS lens with 5-axis image stabilization. Then share photos instantly with built-in Wi-Fi and NFC. Screen Type : 2.95 in (3.0type) (4:3) / 921,600 dots / Xtra Fine / TFT LCD
feature_bullets: Versatile video w/ high-quality XAVC S, AVCHD & MP4 formats, Simple connectivity to smartphones via Wi-Fi w/NFC, 5-axis image stabilization greatly reduces camera shake blur.Recording format:JPEG(DCF Ver.2.0,Exif Ver.2.3,MRF Baseline compliant)

Selfie-ready 3" Extra Fine LCD multi-angle display, P/A/S/M modes, customizable settings and Memory Recall mode, Enhance features w/ downloadable camera apps, Capture the decisive moments with up to 10fps or keep your subject in focus with Lock-on AF
In-The-Box: Rechargeable Battery Pack NP-BX1; AC AdaptorAC-UUD12; Micro USB cable; Wrist Strap; Instruction Manual
30x Optical/60x Clear Image Zoom ZEISS Vario-Sonnar T* Lens, 18.2MP Exmor R CMOS Sensor for superb low light images, Built-in retractable OLED Tru-Finder viewfinder
Focus Range Wide: 1.97" (5 cm) - Infinity Telephoto: 8.20' (2.5 m) - Infinity.Adjustable Angle Up by approx. 180 degrees. F-number (Maximum Aperture) F3.5 (W) - 6.4 (T)
